subject: Football
lead_paragraph: The Giants, needing to fill the hole left by the retired Tiki Barber, added running back Reuben Droughns on Friday by trading wide receiver Tim Carter to the Cleveland Browns.
snippet: The Giants, needing to fill the hole left by the retired Tiki Barber, added running back Reuben Droughns on Friday by trading wide receiver Tim Carter to the Cleveland Browns.
